text: Philippe Marie Eugène, Count d'Ursel (28 June 1920 - 26 March 2017) was a Swiss-born Belgian alpine skier and a member of the Ursel family. He was born in Bern, Switzerland in June 1920 and was a grandson of count Charles d'Ursel. Count d'Ursel competed at the 1948 Winter Olympics in St. Moritz and finished 70th in a field of 111 competitors in the men's downhill event and 39th in a field of 78 competitors in the men's combined event. Count d'Ursel died in March 2017 in Oostkamp, Belgium at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Belgian male alpine skiers Ph Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Belgium Category:Sportspeople from Bern
title: Philippe d'Ursel
